## Extension.extraAttrs() method

Allows for the addition of attributes to the defined schema. This is only used in node and mark extensions.

For now extraAttrs can only be optional

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected extraAttrs(fallback?: string | null): Record<string, {
        default?: unknown;
    }>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fallback | <code>string &#124; null</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Record<string, {
        default?: unknown;
    }>`
